entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 9.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Harbour 12:00 PM PDT Saturday 15 April 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 9.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 78 %
Dewpoint: 5.5°C
Wind: E 7 km/h

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. High 10.
